          <title>
            <string language="de">Types of Reefs</string>
            <string language="en">Types of Coral Reefs</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Reefs can be devided into different types. The fringing reef borders directly on the coastline. The barrier reef is separated from the coast by a wide lagoon. An atoll is a ring-shaped coral reef which encircles a lagoon.</string>
